name: Sack Lunch: Roast Beef Sandwich with Boursin
description: Just add roast beef and Bousin! A baguette, a round of Boursin, and a bottle of Beaujolais is my idea of a Bastille Day lunch. (As you can see, my relationship to France was formed when I was a student,...
recipeIngredient: 1 very good small baguette (or a hunk of good baguette)
A small handful of spinach or arugula

recipeInstructions.text: Split the bread in half. Spread each half with Boursin. Assemble the sandwich.
